ZeroTip is an indie game created in just 3 days during a game jam.
The jam‚Äôs theme was ‚ÄúLoop‚Äù, and our team brought it to life through the time rewind mechanic.

The game features two levels:

üéì Tutorial ‚Äî a training level to master the basics;

üöÄ Main Level ‚Äî a fully playable mission that‚Äôs challenging, fast-paced, and addictive.

The story takes place in the year 3077.
The world has fallen apart, civilization is gone ‚Äî but delivery is sacred.
You are the last Glovo courier, racing through dead space to deliver pizza to the last hungry client.
Star storms, debris, and time distortions stand in your way.
But this time... something went wrong.

‚è™ Time rewind ‚Äî return to crucial moments to fix mistakes;

‚ú® Teleportation ‚Äî instant movement through space;

description.en:
Day Planner ‚Äî Organize your day! A convenient tool to manage your tasks and track your finances in one place.

About the Project: This application was my first professional assignment at my first developer job. It was developed within one week as an MVP (Minimum Viable Product). The focus was on high performance and clean code architecture to ensure future scalability.

Key Features:
Task Management: Create tasks with titles and descriptions, and track progress with checkboxes.
Finance Manager: Track income and expenses with integrated statistics.
Notifications: Dynamic reminders for daily tasks and financial updates.
Data Migration: Daily results automatically transfer to the "Week" tab, and weekly data moves to "Month."
Success Tracking: Analyze your productivity and financial health throughout the month.

Technical Stack:
Engine & Language: Unity, C#.
Animations: Powered by the DOTween library for a fluid UI experience.
Data Persistence: Implemented using PlayerPrefs.
UI/UX: Minimalist and calm design, built for ease of use.

shortDescription.en:
Rusty ‚Äî Your personal assistant for Rust!
Everything you need to survive in Rust, in one app.

Rusty ‚Äî Your personal assistant for Rust!
Everything you need to survive in Rust, in one app.
shortDescription.de:
Rusty ‚Äî Your personal assistant for Rust!
Everything you need to survive in Rust, in one app.

description.en:
Rusty ‚Äî Your personal assistant for Rust

Rusty is designed to simplify gameplay for both beginners and pro players. Stop keeping hundreds of numbers in your head or searching for spreadsheets mid-raid. Use precise tools to dominate the island.

Key Features:
Plant Genetics Calculator: Take control of one of the most complex mechanics in the game. No more manual calculations of gene coefficients (G, Y, H, W, X) to get that perfect GGGYYY combo. Just enter the genes, and the app will calculate the crossbreeding scheme and explain exactly how to plant them.

Raid Calculator: Plan your raids with precision. Whether it's walls, doors, or hatches, the app tells you exactly how many Rockets, C4, or Explosive Ammo you need. It also calculates the total raw materials (Sulfur, Gunpowder, etc.) required to craft the explosives.

Comprehensive Guides: Everything you need to know, from "where to find specific items" to advanced electrical circuits and automation systems.

Recycle Calculator (In progress): No more guessing if that loot is worth a trip to the recycler. Select items from your inventory, and Rusty will instantly show you how much Scrap, Metal Fragments, and HQM you‚Äôll get. Plan your progression with precision!

Tech Stack:

Engine: Unity 6 (6000.1.34f) ‚Äî utilizing the latest long-term support (LTS) engine cycle.
Language: C# ‚Äî implementation of all mathematical logic and core algorithms.
UI: Unity UI (UGUI) ‚Äî responsive layout and design optimized for mobile devices.
Data Architecture: ScriptableObjects ‚Äî decoupled data management for easy configuration of items and explosive types.
Logic: Custom Algorithms ‚Äî proprietary implementation of plant crossbreeding logic based on Facepunch game mechanics.

She highlights your style, shares your musical taste, and always stays on the same wavelength as the community.

description.en:
Rainbow is more than just a bot. It‚Äôs server customization, immersive sound, and an AI personality that doesn't just respond‚Äîit catches the vibe of the chat. It highlights your style, shares your musical taste, and always stays on the same wavelength as the community.

Project Evolution & History
- Inception: The core concept was born in 2019.
- Initial Prototype: The first version was a simple script designed to cycle nickname colors based on a hardcoded role ID.
- Active Development: A new era of development kicked off in 2023‚Äì2024.
- Complete Remaster: The project was entirely rewritten from scratch on a modern codebase. Only the name remains‚Äîa nod to the first development experiments.

Technical Challenges & Optimization
Building Rainbow involved overcoming numerous technical hurdles, particularly regarding API rate limits (Discord, Spotify, YouTube). The current version is the result of deep architectural optimization:
- Audio Scaling: Due to the limitations of standard libraries, I implemented WaveLink (Lavalink), offloading audio stream processing to a standalone process.
- Smart Cache System: Built a custom "smart" caching system with LRU (Least Recently Used) and TTL (Time To Live) logic. This separates YouTube and Spotify caches, implements regular data pruning, and minimizes API calls.
- Queue Management: Integrated inactivity managers and optimized queue handling algorithms, making the music module significantly more stable than in previous iterations.

Key Features
Comprehensive Profile Customization:
- Dynamic Color Cycling: Smooth role color transitions using presets or custom user settings.
- Prefix Management: Real-time prefix updates with support for specific time intervals.
- Decorative Typography: A module for transforming standard nicknames into stylized, decorative fonts.
 Music Service (WaveLink):
- High-Fidelity Streaming: Stable audio playback from YouTube and Spotify via Lavalink.
- Advanced Control: Full control over the queue and playback parameters through an intuitive button-based UI.

Future Roadmap
- Admin Module: Implementing automated moderation tools and advanced server management.
- AI Consultant (Grok-style): Integration of a neural network model for user interaction, conversation recaps, and interactive setup assistance.
- Multi-channel Audio: Developing a technical solution to allow the bot to reside in multiple voice channels simultaneously within a single server.
- Localization: Implementing a multi-language system to expand the bot‚Äôs reach to international communities.

Development Philosophy
This project is in a state of continuous evolution. It is not a "finished" product but a platform that is constantly improving. Legacy modules are being optimized, and new features are added in strict accordance with the latest Discord API standards.

Tech Stack
- Framework: discord.py (v2.6.0)
- Audio Engine: wavelink, PyNaCl, ffmpeg-python
- Integrations: spotipy, yt-dlp
- Networking & Monitoring: aiohttp, httpx, psutil
- Data Management: JSON, OrderedDict (for LRU cache implementation)
